__e: And here we are... we three... perhaps the last island of beauty in the world.
We would like to think we are island of calm in the middle of the city,
So, one of these nights, when you find your corner of heaven or your sliver of peace and you're feeling guilty about the distance between you and your son...
I am a girl who loves my island And the girl who loves the sea It calls me
I'm just a big island you can come and go from as you please!
Now, this is my island and I know it better than anyone.
